programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Left for Dead / On the Case (#126)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E25, A detective in California tracks down a prostitute's killer with the help of a key piece of evidence. And two persistent cold case detectives use DNA to investigate the 1990 murder of a woman and the death of a man killed in a car crash in 1988.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E07, We follow Det. Vince Velazquez of Atlanta and Capt. Russell Popham of East Point, Ga., as they work to solve the 1995 rape and murder of 14-year-old Nacole Smith, one of Atlanta's most notorious unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Grand Openings

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees

programme.title: The Royal Court

programme.title: Freefall

Northpole, 20141115000000 +0000, When a loss of togetherness spreads across the globe and threatens the existence of Santa's Northpole, a little boy named Kevin is called upon to save the day.
Nostalgic Christmas, 20191031000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Hand carved Santa figurines help inspire a town that needs Christmas cheer.
Miss Christmas, 20171105000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A letter from a young boy sends an official tree finder to a small town.

Lucky Christmas, 20111112000000 +0000, Holly Ceroni is devastated when she learns her winning lottery ticket is in her stolen car. But what happens when the man behind it falls for Holly? Stars Elizabeth Berkley and Jason Gray-Stanford.

programme.title: Allies
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E20, Kenmore arrives back in Atlantis with a group of Wraith, in the midst of a civil war. Kenmore, hoping to leverage his knowledge of Atlantis against Sheppard and the team, suggests a trade; Beckett's serum, in exchange for keeping Atlantis hidden.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: The Nox
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E08, When a planned ambush goes disastrously wrong, resulting in fatalities among the SG-1 team, the peace-loving Nox restore them to life. But while these gentle people can bring back the dead, can they resist the deadly technology of the Goa'uld?

programme.title: Brief Candle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E09, On the mysterious planet Argos, the beautiful Kynthia seduces Colonel Jack O'Neill, which means he's condemned to an Argosian lifespan of only a hundred days. As he turns gray, will his team succeed in their frantic search for a cure?

programme.title: Thor's Hammer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E10, Looking for allies against the Goa'uld, the SG-1 team lands on Cimmeria, home of the legendary Norse gods. Teal'c and O'Neill are transported to an underground labyrinth of caves of the vicious creature Unas. Can Carter & Daniel rescue them?

programme.title: The Torment Of Tantalus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E11, Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers that in 1945, a young professor slipped through the Stargate, never to return. Together with his still living fiancée, the SG-1 team discovers the now aged professor trapped in a decaying fortress.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E12, With the proviso that he bring back a Goa'uld larva for study, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns to Chulak to stop the Goa'uld from enslaving his son Rya'c. Trouble is, Rya'c needs a larva to survive - and the only one available is Teal'c's.

programme.title: Fire And Water
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E13, The SG-1 team returns from the planet Oannes in a panic and minus Daniel Jackson, who was last seen being consumed by a column of flames. But as his comrades mourn him on Earth, Daniel is the captive of an amphibious humanoid creature known as Nem.

programme.title: Hathor
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E14, The evil Goa'uld Hathor (Suanne Braun) escapes from a Mayan pyramid in Mexico. At the Stargate facility, she uses her charms to seduce the men into helping her take over the world. Can Samantha Carter and her female colleagues defeat her?

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E15, Capt. Carter returns with the sole survivor of a planetary plague - a little girl, Cassandra. As they become attached, Carter discovers the girl's terrible secret - a time bomb implanted by the Goa'uld. Can she save the girl - and the world?

programme.title: Cor-Ai
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E16, Colonel Jack O'Neill and the team travel to Chartago, where Teal'c is recognized as once having been head Jaffa to the sinister Goa'uld Apothis. He's arrested for murder and put on trial for his life. Can his comrades save him?

programme.title: Enigma
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E17, The SG-1 team rescues a group of highly developed survivors from the cataclysmic planet of Tollan. To stop the legendary knowledge of the Tollan people from falling into the wrong hands, O'Neill and his team stake all on the cross-universal rescue.

programme.title: Solitudes
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E18, Following a Stargate technical defect, O'Neill and Carter find themselves stranded on an icy wasteland. O'Neill is severely wounded, both are freezing to death, and nobody can find the section of the universe in which they are stranded!

programme.title: Tin Man
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E19, Upon landing on Planet PX3 989, the mysterious alien Harlan renders the SG-1 team unconscious. After waking and returning to Earth, they find that their spirits and minds have been transferred to androids. Can the team regain their bodies and souls?

programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E11, Allie is terrified she may lose the love of her life when Nick gets the bends in a daring attempt to rescue a mini-sub on the ocean floor.

programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E12, A dark secret from Dawn's past could jeopardize her career as a Baywatch Hawaii Lifeguard. JD puts his new invention, a double scuba fin, to the test trying to rescue a young boy being sucked into whirring propeller blades in a storm vent.

programme.title: Liquid Visions
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E13, Dawn and Sean are drawn to the strange and spiritual powers of the mind. Kekoa, Allie and Jessie try to save lives after disaster strikes at a party.

programme.title: Lines in the Sand
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E14, Sean has mixed feelings about Jenna, the beautiful but smug new head of North Shore Lifeguards. When nudists protest on the beach, Sean and Jenna have to work intimately together to save the day, if they don't kill each other first!

programme.title: Thunder Tide
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E15, Kekoa, Dawn and Allie reexamine their femininity. Jason rehearses a love scene with a sexy actress. JD tries to rebound from his breakup with Jessie.

programme.title: Breath of Life
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E16, Dawn saves a skydiver who could be her ex-boyfriend in disguise. Jason is assigned to a Beach where he has to confront a terrible incident from his past.

programme.title: Big Island Heat
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E17, Jason falls for a Kahuna's beautiful granddaughter. Jenna wants to take over the team and shut down the training center she thinks is a waste of money. Sean vows to fight her.

programme.title: The Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E18, Sean reveals a secret to Jenna that could threaten his job. Allie and Jason fly her helicopter to the big island where they have to rescue four people trapped on a volcanic lava reef.

programme.title: Maui Xterra
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E19, Jessie tries to overcome her condition to compete in the Maui triathlon with Dawn as her coach. Allie suspects an agenda behind Dawn's motives. Jason and Kekoa seek a mysterious underwater Hawaiian spirit that lures people to their deaths.

programme.title: Baywatch Ohana
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E20, Sean tries to keep his relationship with Jenna a secret. When the team has to rescue swimmers trapped in a filtration tube, Jenna is sucked down a shaft and Sean risks everything to save her, revealing his darkest secret.

programme.title: The Last Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E21, No longer able to cope with his guilt of surviving the attack on Pearl Harbor, Jessie's grandfather comes to Hawaii to end his life. Can Mitch intervene in time? Kekoa and Sean help a college basketball player learn to swim.

programme.title: The Killing Machine
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S10E22, Mitch goes undercover to stop an ex-Navy SEAL turned eco-terrorist from detonating a deadly underwater explosive device. When Mitch's dive gear floats to the surface, Sean and the team fear the worst.

programme.title: Soul Survivor
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E01, Sean clashes with Jenna. A new love triangle emerges between new recruit Zack and rookie hopeful Carrie, who’s more interested in Jason. Sean and new lifeguard Leigh Dwyer confront daredevil Cliff, whose dangerous antics disrupt the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Knife in the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E02, A teenager's waverunner causes accidents and his father threatens to sue Baywatch for not rescuing him ahead of his victims. JD takes out his personal problems on Sean. Zack relentlessly pursues Carrie while she pursues Jason.
